String.name: Arrow I
String.tooltip:
Shoot an arrow at a target up to $maxDistance away.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Sharan Bolt I
String.tooltip:
Unleash a bolt of Sharan energy at a single target up to $maxDistance away.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Blast I
String.tooltip: Fire a shot which explodes on impact with an enemy or obstacle within $maxDistance.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to three hits, with the third hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Divine Radiance I
String.tooltip: Project a pulse of energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away.

String.name: Combo Attack I
String.tooltip: Strike one or more targets in front of you, and gain MP with each hit. Successive strikes do more damage, up to four hits, with the fourth hit dealing substantially more.

String.name: Fireball I
String.tooltip:
Shoot a fireball at one target within $maxDistance.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Arrow Volley I
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Axe Block
String.tooltip: Block frontal attacks with your weapon. Damage blocked depends on your weapon's stats. Remains active as long as you hold down the skill button.

String.name: Corruption Ring I
String.tooltip: Drain HP from targets within 6m, storing it as spiritual energy. The HP absorbed is proportional to how long you channel the ring. Use the Infusion Ring skill to release the stored energy.

String.name: Bombardment I
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once to target an area within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again to launch a volley of eleven shots with a high chance of stagger. Gain 100 Willpower for each successful hit.

String.name: Stand Fast I
String.tooltip: Block frontal attacks with your shield. Damage reduction depends on your equipment. Reduces damage as long as you hold down the skill button. Allies behind you also get damage reduction.

String.name: Regeneration Circle I
String.tooltip: Up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance of you heal $value HP every $tickInterval for $time (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Knockdown Strike I
String.tooltip: Bowl your enemy over with a mighty swing of your sword.

String.name: Ice Needle I
String.tooltip: Launch a damaging ice shard through a line of targets up to $maxDistance that briefly slows the targets' movement speed by $value.

String.name: Evasive Roll
String.tooltip: Dodge your enemy's attack.

String.name: Arrow Volley I
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring I
String.tooltip: Release stored spiritual energy as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance.

String.tooltip: Launch a damaging ice shard through a line of targets up to $maxDistance that briefly slows the targets' movement speed by $value.

String.name: Arrow Volley V
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Infusion Ring V
String.tooltip: Release stored spiritual energy as MP to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance.

String.name: Arrow Volley VI
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Corruption Ring VI
String.tooltip: Drain HP from targets within 6m, storing it as spiritual energy. The HP absorbed is proportional to how long you channel the ring. Use the Infusion Ring skill to release the stored energy.

String.name: Bombardment VI
String.tooltip: Press the skill button once to target an area within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again to launch a volley of eleven shots with a high chance of stagger. Gain 100 Willpower for each successful hit.

String.name: Radiant Arrow I
String.tooltip:
Charge up the arrow's damage by holding down the skill button, then shoot the arrow up to $maxDistance by releasing the button. Only charges to one level.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Thunder Strike I
String.tooltip: Charge up your axe by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. Only charges to one level.

String.name: Titanic Wrath I
String.tooltip: Energy pours into you and non-hostile players within $maxDistance, increasing Power by $value for $time.

String.name: Scattershot I
String.tooltip: Fire a spread of five penetrating shots at enemies within $maxDistance. Gain 20 Willpower for each successful hit, up to a maximum of 100 Willpower.

String.name: Onslaught I
String.tooltip: Rush your foe and lunge repeatedly. You are less likely to be knocked down or staggered, and you take only half damage while using this skill. Activates faster if you first use Shield Bash.

String.name: Healing Circle I
String.tooltip: Heal $hpDiff HP for up to $maxCount nearby group members other than you (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Whirlwind I
String.tooltip: Spin with your sword, hitting targets within $maxDistance.

String.name: Lightning Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a ring-shaped trap that briefly stuns its victims. Trap lasts 10 seconds or until triggered.

String.name: Double Shear I
String.tooltip: Fling your scythes to strike a ranged target. The scythes strike the target again as they return to you. Damage is doubled when used in a chain with Spiral Barrage (after 3rd, 4th, or 5th hit), Grim Strike, Pendulum Strike, Whipsaw, Death Spiral, Smite, or Shadow Lash.

String.name: Torrent of Blows I
String.tooltip: Swing your swords in a wide arc, drawing high aggro from surrounding enemies. While using this skill, you are less likely to be knocked down or staggered, and you take only half damage.

String.name: Penetrating Arrow I

String.name: Flatten I
String.tooltip: Pound the ground, stunning targets within $maxDistance.

String.name: Ancient Binding I
String.tooltip: Hurl a magical bolt forward $maxDistance, briefly slowing the target by $value.

String.name: Point Blank I
String.tooltip: Swing your arcannon to attack enemies within $maxDistance. Press the skill button again to fire a shot knocking themand youback.

String.name: Challenging Shout I
String.tooltip: Draw the attention of enemies within $maxDistance, increasing their aggro toward you.

String.name: Evasive Roll
String.tooltip: Dodge your enemy's attack.

String.name: Arcane Pulse I
String.tooltip: Charge up the pulse's damage by holding down the skill button, then release the button to hit targets in a $maxDistance line.

String.name: Sundering Strike I
String.tooltip: Gather shadows into your scythes to deal a fatal blow to a target in front of you. Sundering Strike inflicts more damage to enemies with lower HP. Shadows at the epicenter of the attack explode after 3 seconds to deal additional damage. Sundering Strike activates faster when chained with Double Shear or Grim Strike.

String.name: Rain of Blows I
String.tooltip: Execute a flurry of sword swings while advancing on your foe. Damage taken reduces by 30% while this skill is being used.

$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Rain of Arrows I
String.tooltip: Shoot arrows into the sky; they descend $offsetDistance away and damage targets in the circle where they land.

String.name: Dash I
String.tooltip: Increase your speed by $value for $time.

String.name: Titanic Favor I
String.tooltip: Immediately heal up to $maxCount allies for $hpDiff HP, then heal an additional $value HP every $tickInterval for $time (modified by your heal bonus). Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount group members within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Burst Fire I
String.tooltip: Fire a penetrating shot affecting up to three enemies in a line up to $maxDistance away. Holding down the skill button continues firing as long as you have Willpower. Each successive shot has increased skill damage and chance to crit. Enemies hit are slowed (no effect on bosses).

String.name: Shield Bash
String.tooltip: Briefly stun one or more foes.

String.name: Blessing of Shakan I
String.tooltip: You and your allies within $maxDistance receive a blessing that increases your Power by $value for $time.

String.name: Dash I
String.tooltip: Increase your speed by $value for $time.

String.name: Mana Infusion I
String.tooltip: You regain $value MP every $tickinterval for $time. Effect does not end even if combat starts.

String.name: Grim Strike I
String.tooltip: Fling your scythes to strike a target in front of you. Grim Strike activates faster when chained with Spiral Barrage (after 3rd, 4th, or 5th hit), Double Shear, Pendulum Strike, Whipsaw, Death Spiral, Smite, or Shadow Lash.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: Quickly back up out of harm's way.

String.name: Staggering Strike I
String.tooltip: Make a sweeping attack that briefly stuns and turns your target around.

String.name: Shara's Lash
String.tooltip: Cast a bolt of Sharan energy forward $maxDistance that explodes at range or on contact, briefly stunning foes.

String.name: Time Bomb I
String.tooltip: Fire a shot that explodes on impact with an target or obstacle within $maxDistance, leaving behind a Time Bomb that detonates two seconds later. Enemies near a Time Bomb are slowed, and the secondary detonation blasts any surviving enemies into the air. Gain 20 Willpower on a successful hit, and 40 Willpower from the secondary detonation. The Time Bomb does not lift bosses or BAMs.

String.name: Arise I
String.tooltip: Instantly stands group members up to $maxDistance away and increases Balance Factor by $value for $time.

String.name: Backstab I
String.tooltip: Rush $maxDistance and make a lethal thrust to your target's back. The target is immobilized. Ends if target is knocked down.

String.name: Fireblast I
String.tooltip: Blast targets in a flaming circle with a $maxRadius radius centered $offsetDistance in front of you.

String.name: Death Spiral I
String.tooltip: Spin your scythes in a 720 degree arc, dealing damage to all enemies around you, and reducing the movement speed of all monsters hit for 5 seconds. You can use Death Spiral in a chain to interrupt your own skill actions. You can Spiral twice within 6 seconds, but a cooldown time triggers after the second Spiral or 6 seconds after the first.

String.name: Death Spiral I

String.name: Feign Death I
String.tooltip: Deceive monsters by pretending to be dead. This resets all aggro on you. You can feign death for up to $time. Ends when you use a skill or take damage.

String.name: Mocking Shout
String.tooltip: Your warlike shout has a chance of staggering enemies within $maxDistance. You become immune to knockdown and stagger for $time, while greatly increasing your resistance to weakening effects.

String.name: Mana Infusion
String.tooltip: You regain $value MP every $tickinterval for $time. Ends if you take damage or use a combat skill or item.

String.name: Arcane Barrage I
String.tooltip: Fire an energy pulse that damages all enemies in a line up to $maxDistance. Press the skill button again to detonate the pulse, damaging enemies in a wide radius with a high critical chance. If used within 40m of a summoned HB construct, the HB fires five Electric Bombs at the detonation point.

String.name: Guardian Shout I
String.tooltip: Adds 91% to endurance of other group members within 20m for $time. Does not apply to you. Effect ends if you are knocked down.

String.name: Slumber I
String.tooltip: Cast narcoleptic energy at an enemy up to $maxDistance away, putting your target briefly to sleep.

String.name: Triumphant Shout I
String.tooltip: Instantly restore $mpDiff MP. Your MP doesn't decay for $time.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: Quickly back up out of harm's way.

String.name: Final Judgment I
String.tooltip: Throw your scythes at an enemy to deal a fatal blow. Final Judgment can attack enemies at long range.

String.name: Final Judgment I

String.name: Feign Death II
String.tooltip: Deceive monsters by pretending to be dead. This resets all aggro on you. You can feign death for up to $time. Ends when you use a skill or take damage.

String.name: Arcane Barrage II
String.tooltip: Fire an energy pulse that damages all enemies in a line up to $maxDistance. Press the skill button again to detonate the pulse, damaging enemies in a wide radius with a high critical chance. If used within 40m of a summoned HB construct, the HB fires five Electric Bombs at the detonation point.

String.name: Guardian Shout II
String.tooltip: Adds 91% to endurance of other group members within 20m for $time. Does not apply to you. Effect ends if you are knocked down.

String.name: Slumber II

String.name: Rapid Fire I
String.tooltip:
Hold down the skill button to quickly fire up to 7 arrows $maxDistance away.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Fiery Rage I
String.tooltip: Harness inner rage to increase your Power by $value and decrease your Endurance by $value2 for $time.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast I
String.tooltip: Project a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.

String.name: Shield Counter I
String.tooltip: Gain a chance to shield-thump your foe while using the Stand Fast skill. You can't be knocked down or staggered, and you take half damage while using the skill.

String.name: Mana Infusion
String.tooltip: You regain $value MP every $tickinterval for $time. Ends if you take damage or use a combat skill or item.

String.name: Overhand Strike I
String.tooltip: Swing downward for a massive blow. Skill activates faster if you first use Whirlwind, Knockdown Strike, Leaping Strike, Stunning Backhand, Heart Thrust, Startling Kick, Eviscerate, or the fourth consecutive hit with Combo Attack.

String.name: Flame Pillar I
String.tooltip: Summon a column of flame in front of you that burns enemies within $maxDistance.

String.name: Whipsaw I
String.tooltip: Fling your scythes at enemies within range to inflict multiple hits, recovering some of your own HP. In PVP, healing is reduced on any players hit by the spinning scythes by 10% per hit (stacks up to 5). You can use Whipsaw to interrupt your own skill actions when used in a chain with Spiral Barrage, Double Shear, or Pendulum Strike.

String.name: Assault Stance I
String.tooltip: Your power rises by 36%, but your endurance decreases by 10%. Your Crit Rate increases by 30. You can use only one stance at a time.

String.name: Resurrect

String.name: Arc Bomb I
String.tooltip: Lob a bomb up to $maxDistance away to explode upon impact with an enemy or obstacle. Stuns nearby enemies. If thrown at the ground, the bomb bounces up to three times before exploding. Gain 20 Willpower on a successful hit.

String.name: Debilitate I
String.tooltip: Briefly weaken the Endurance of your foes by $value. Effect stacks up to three times. In PvP, also decreases your foe's HP recovery by 50% at any number of stacks.

String.name: Purifying Circle
String.tooltip: Instantly remove all harmful effects from up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance.

String.name: Retaliate I

String.name: Death From Above IV
String.tooltip: Become invincible while executing a surprise blow.

String.name: Cyclone V
String.tooltip: Charge up your attack by holding down the skill button, then release it to spin your axe in a circle. Charges to three levels. Overcharging beyond the third-level charge will damage you. While charging up, you can move at half speed.

String.name: Arc Bomb V
String.tooltip: Lob a bomb up to $maxDistance away to explode upon impact with an enemy or obstacle. Stuns nearby enemies. If thrown at the ground, the bomb bounces up to three times before exploding. Gain 20 Willpower on a successful hit.

String.name: Poison Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a trap that damages the victim by $value each $tickInterval for $time. The trap lasts for 20 seconds or until triggered. Does less damage to other players.

String.name: Leaping Strike I
String.tooltip: Jump at your foe and smash downward. Knocked-down foes take 5x damage once you learn Merciless Leap.

String.name: Summon: Party
String.tooltip: Teleport all group members within the same province to your side. You cannot teleport group members who are in other provinces.

String.name: Rocket Jump I
String.tooltip: Fire a rocket at the ground, damaging nearby enemies and propelling yourself forward. Use during Rolling Reload for additional distance.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Metamorphic Blast I
String.tooltip: Project a cone of divine energy that damages nearby enemies.

String.name: Magma Bomb I
String.tooltip: Arc a fiery projectile $offsetDistance away, where it explodes in a $maxRadius radius.

String.name: Shadow Lash I
String.tooltip: Create a whip of shadows and fling it at targets in front of you. Shadow lash can be chained together up to 4 times and replenishes MP on every hit. A cooldown time begins after the chain ends.

String.name: Velik's Mark I
String.tooltip: Mark a target within $maxDistance for $time. You deal 20% more damage to the marked target.

String.name: Unchained Anger I
String.tooltip: Sacrifice HP to gain $mpDiff MP.

String.name: Vow of Rebirth
String.tooltip: Form a pact between you and a group member in front of you, who will resurrect if killed in the next $time.

String.name: Infuriate
String.tooltip: Infuriate all monsters within $maxDistance and increase your aggro to the maximum amount.

String.name: Resurrect
String.tooltip: When dead group members lie within $maxDistance, you can restore life to the nearest $MaxCount.

String.name: Heart Thrust I
String.tooltip: Step forward, attacking your target's vulnerable spots.

String.name: Void Pulse I
String.tooltip: Launch a powerful sphere at a single target within $maxDistance.

String.name: Shadow Burst I
String.tooltip: Gather shadows into your scythes and strike the ground, damaging nearby targets. Press the skill button again to inflict additional damage with a high chance of pulling enemies toward you and to the ground. You cannot be staggered or knocked down while using Shadow Burst.

String.name: Leaping Strike I
String.tooltip: Jump at your foe and smash downward. Knocked-down foes take 5x damage once you learn Merciless Leap.

String.name: Shadow Burst I
String.tooltip: Gather shadows into your scythes and strike the ground, damaging nearby targets. Press the skill button again to inflict additional damage with a high chance of pulling enemies toward you and to the ground. You cannot be staggered or knocked down while using Shadow Burst.

String.name: Electric Bomb I
String.tooltip: Lob a bomb up to $maxDistance, which explodes on impact and creates a target for your HB construct. The HB throws five more bombs of equal strength at the same spot. Gain 10 Willpower for each successful hit. Only usable with a summoned HB construct within 40m.

String.name: Shadow Burst I
String.tooltip: Gather shadows into your scythes and strike the ground, damaging nearby targets. Press the skill button again to inflict additional damage with a high chance of pulling enemies toward you and to the ground. You cannot be staggered or knocked down while using Shadow Burst.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Aura of the Merciless I
String.tooltip: An aura emanates within 30m of you, doubling the crit rate of group members. Drains 30 MP every 2 seconds while active. Cannot be used with Aura of the Swift.

String.name: Balder's Vengeance I
String.tooltip: Deal critical damage to all enemies in front of you, up to $maxDistance. You are invulnerable while using this skill.

String.name: Spring Attack I
String.tooltip: Leap to your foe and strike a hard blow. Activates faster if you first use Shield Bash, Shield Barrage, or the third consecutive hit of Combo Attack.

String.name: Homeward Bound
String.tooltip: Teleport yourself and group members within 20m to the nearest campfire.

String.name: Stunning Backhand I
String.tooltip: Swing your sword around, briefly stunning your foe.

String.name: Mindblast I
String.tooltip: Briefly put targets to sleep in a $maxRadius radius centered $offsetDistance in front of you.

String.name: Soul Reversal
String.tooltip: Throw a shadowy cable at a single target within 20 meters. If hit, the target becomes entangled in the cable and takes damage over time. Activate Soul Reversal again to stun a tangled target within 40 meters and switch positions with that target. You cannot switch positions with entangled bosses or elite monsters, and you can only have one entangled target at a time.

String.name: Incendiary Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a trap that damages the victim that steps on it and others nearby. The trap lasts for 12 seconds or until triggered.

String.name: Vampiric Blow I
String.tooltip: Charge up your axe by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. A portion of the damage returns to you as healing. Only charges to one level. Activates faster but with less healing if you first overcharge Thunder Strike, Cyclone, or Lethal Strike.

String.name: Aura of the Unyielding I
String.tooltip: An aura emanates within 30m of you, increasing group members' crit resistance by 30%. Drains 30 MP every 2 seconds while active. Cannot be used with Aura of the Tenacious.

String.name: Replenishment I
String.tooltip: Replenish 300 MP and 100 Willpower. 50% chance to eliminate cooldown for Scattershot and Arcane Barrage.

String.name: Charging Lunge I
String.tooltip: Charge a short distance and impale your target.

String.name: Blessing of Zenobia
String.tooltip: Boost the non-combat speed of you and your allies within $maxDistance by $value for $time.

String.name: Startling Kick I
String.tooltip: Briefly stun your target with a kick, then leap backward.

String.name: Retribution I
String.tooltip: Prepare to counter an incoming attack. If you activate Retribution right before an attack lands, you ignore all damage and immediately charge toward the enemy. While preparing, you also ignore all damage and become immune to all effects. Attack speed does not affect the Retribution skill.

String.name: Retribution I
String.tooltip: Prepare to counter an incoming attack. If you activate Retribution right before an attack lands, you ignore all damage and immediately charge toward the enemy. While preparing, you also ignore all damage and become immune to all effects. Attack speed does not affect the Retribution skill.

String.name: Vampiric Blow IV
String.tooltip: Charge up your axe by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. A portion of the damage returns to you as healing. Charges to three levels. While charging up, you can move at half speed. Activates faster but with less healing if you first overcharge Thunder Strike, Cyclone, or Lethal Strike.

String.name: Aura of the Unyielding IV
String.tooltip: An aura emanates within 30m of you, increasing group members' crit resistance by 60%. Drains 30 MP every 2 seconds while active. Cannot be used with Aura of the Tenacious.

String.name: Replenishment IV
String.tooltip: Replenish 375 MP and 100 Willpower. 50% chance to eliminate cooldown for Scattershot and Arcane Barrage.

String.name: Charging Lunge IV
String.tooltip: Charge a short distance and impale your target.

String.name: Startling Kick IV
String.tooltip: Briefly stun your target with a kick, then leap backward.

String.name: Incendiary Trap V
String.tooltip: Set a trap that damages the victim that steps on it and others nearby. The trap lasts for 12 seconds or until triggered.

String.name: Breakaway Bolt I
String.tooltip: Shoot an explosive arrow that damages targets within $maxDistance, then step backward.

String.name: Fearsome Shout I
String.tooltip: Monsters within $maxDistance briefly run away from you. Fear effect ends if target is knocked down. In PvP, Fear effect ends if target is attacked.

String.name: Aura of the Tenacious
String.tooltip: An aura emanates within 30m of you, restoring 20 MP to all other group members every second. Drains 30 MP every 2 seconds while active. Cannot be used with Aura of the Unyielding.

String.name: Second Wind I
String.tooltip: Recovers $hpDiff HP and 750 Resolve.

String.name: Shocking Implosion I
String.tooltip: Produce an electrical burst $maxDistance in front of you.

String.name: Fury Strike I
String.tooltip: Slash your sword in front of you; the lower your HP, the greater the damage.

String.name: Painblast I
String.tooltip: Up to $maxcount targets within a $maxRadius radius centered $offsetDistance in front of you take $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. Does less damage to other players.

String.name: Shadow Reaping
String.tooltip: Reap the shadows around you. While reaping, the cooldown time of Double Shear, Grim Strike, Pendulum Strike, Whipsaw, Sundering Strike, Cable Step, Death Spiral, Smite, and Retaliate are reduced by 70%.

String.name: Charging Slash I
String.tooltip: Charge toward your target, drawing high aggro.

String.name: Web Arrow I
String.tooltip:
Shoot an arrow up to $maxDistance, inflicting damage and slowing the target's movement speed by $value for $time.
$H_S_GOODPVP:$COLOR_END Reduced damage at max distance.

String.name: Flurry of Blows I
String.tooltip: Your attack and charging speed increases by $value for $time.

String.name: Teleport Jaunt
String.tooltip: Teleport a short distance in the direction the camera faces.

String.name: Adrenaline Rush I
String.tooltip: Your attack speed increases by $value for $time: Melee attack skill cooldowns decrease by half, and you gain additional aggro..

String.name: Prayer of Peace I
String.tooltip: Nullify your aggro from nearby enemies.

String.name: Headlong Rush I
String.tooltip: Charge forward, increasing the speed of your next attack within 10 seconds by 30%. Effect ends after 10 seconds or when you hit a target.

String.name: Painful Trap I
String.tooltip: Set a trap that explodes when stepped on. Trap lasts 10 seconds.

String.name: Spirit Gallows
String.tooltip: Hold and charge the skill button to levitate surrounding enemies. The longer you hold the charge, the higher your enemies will rise and the more damage they will take when they fall. Levitated enemies cannot be damaged by normal attacks until dropped, and will fall immediately if you are immobilized.

String.name: Vortex Slash I
String.tooltip: Swing your swords in a wide arc. You can use it as a chain skill only after Evasive Roll or Death From Above.

String.name: Close Quarters I
String.tooltip: Strike a foe in front of you. Press the skill button twice to make a second attack that may stun the foe.

String.name: Lethal Strike I
String.tooltip: Charge up your attack by holding down the skill button, then release it to attack. Costs HP to use, not MP. Only charges to one level.

String.name: Arun's Vitae I
String.tooltip: Gather Arunic power to create a mote that recovers 187 HP every second for 5 seconds and removes all harmful effects.

String.name: HB-1
String.tooltip: Summon a construct to aid you. HB-1 deals moderate damage to nearby enemies when summoned. When you are below max HP, HB-1 aims a healing ray at you. Command: Stay/Follow, Command: Recall, and Command: Self-Destruct work while HB-1 is active. If you move more than 60m from HB-1, it will teleport to your side. Lasts for 30 minutes or until death.

String.name: Shield Barrage I
String.tooltip: Move forward, attacking target with your shield. Repeat the attack up to 2 hits, and the last hit may briefly stun your target.

String.name: Heal Thyself I
String.tooltip: Restore $hpDiff HP to yourself (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Overpower I
String.tooltip: Gather your might for a decisive blow. Your next attack within $time does $value extra damage.

String.name: Glacial Retreat I
String.tooltip: Freeze the ground before you as you leap backward, briefly decreasing the movement speed of your target by $value.

String.name: Shrouded Escape
String.tooltip: Cloak yourself in shadow, reducing aggro and becoming invisible. This effect lasts for 5 seconds maximum, and dispels on using a skill or being attacked.

String.name: Combative Strike I
String.tooltip: Sacrifice HP to deal a decisive attack, decreasing the Endurance of your targets by $value and their HP recovery by 50%.

Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Final Salvo V
String.tooltip: Hold down the skill button to shoot up to 5 arrows $maxDistance away. Does less damage at maximum range. You can use it as a chain skill only after Radiant Arrow or Penetrating Arrow.

String.name: Iron Will V
String.tooltip: Your iron will absorbs $value damage, consuming 1 MP for every 100 damage absorbed. Effect ends when you absorb damage beyond the limit, when you run out of MP, or after $time.

String.name: Kaia's Shield V
String.tooltip: Cast a barrier that absorbs $value damage on up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance for $time. Allies are immune to knockdown and stagger while barrier is up. Effect ends when it reaches damage limit.

String.name: Final Salvo VI
String.tooltip: Hold down the skill button to shoot up to 5 arrows $maxDistance away. Does less damage at maximum range. You can use it as a chain skill only after Radiant Arrow or Penetrating Arrow.

String.name: Iron Will VI
String.tooltip: Your iron will absorbs $value damage, consuming 1 MP for every 100 damage absorbed. Effect ends when you absorb damage beyond the limit, when you run out of MP, or after $time.

String.name: Final Salvo VII
String.tooltip: Hold down the skill button to shoot up to 5 arrows $maxDistance away. Does less damage at maximum range. You can use it as a chain skill only after Radiant Arrow or Penetrating Arrow.

String.name: Final Salvo VIII
String.tooltip: Hold down the skill button to shoot up to 5 arrows $maxDistance away. Does less damage at maximum range. You can use it as a chain skill only after Radiant Arrow or Penetrating Arrow.

String.name: Concussion Trap I
String.tooltip: Launch a trap 15m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Briefly stuns the target and surrounding enemies.

String.name: Metamorphic Smite I
String.tooltip: Damage targets within $maxDistance.

String.name: Command: Stay/Follow
String.tooltip: Order your HB construct to stay in place or to begin following you again. The HB will change facing to orient on you, and will automatically teleport to your side if you move more than 60m away.

String.name: Master's Leash I
String.tooltip: Throw another hook to pull the target nearer. You can use this skill only after using Leash.

String.name: Blessing of Balder I
String.tooltip: You and up to $maxCount allies within $maxDistance heal $value HP every $tickInterval for $time (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Measured Slice I
String.tooltip: Gather your might and make a wide slice at the enemy's neck. Skill activates faster following Overhand Strike or Eviscerate.

String.name: Mana Volley I
String.tooltip: Up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance lose 25% of their total MP immediately and 172 further MP every 2 seconds for 10 seconds. This only affects other players. However, hitting any target replenishes 25% of your total MP. Press the skill button once and mouseover to lock on targets, then press the skill button again to shoot at all targets.

String.name: Staggering Counter I
String.tooltip: Execute a counterattack that briefly stuns targets. You can use this skill as a counterattack only after you've been hit.

String.name: Measured Slice I
String.tooltip: Gather your might and make a wide slice at the enemy's neck. Skill activates faster following Overhand Strike or Eviscerate.

String.name: Ensnaring Trap I
String.tooltip: Launch a trap 15m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Briefly slows down the target and surrounding enemies.

String.name: Evasive Smash I
String.tooltip: Interrupt a charging skill with an evasive roll then follow up with an uppercut rib-rattling attack. The evasive roll requires one press of the skill button. The smash requires another press of the skill button immediately after. The smash's damage varies based on the level of the charging skill interrupted.

String.name: Volley of Curses I
String.tooltip: Inflict a curse that does $value damage every $tickInterval for $time. Effect stacks up to three times. Does less damage to other players. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on to $maxCount target within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to curse all targets.

String.name: Chained Leash
String.tooltip: Throw a chain around a target within 15m and pull up to 6 enemies within 15m together into a tight group. Chained Leash stuns the target.

String.name: Eviscerate
String.tooltip: Deals powerful damage and knocks the opponent down. This skill activates faster when following Overhand Strike, Whirlwind, Knockdown Strike, Leaping Strike, Stunning Backhand, Heart Thrust, Startling Kick, or the fourth consecutive hit with Combo Attack.

String.name: Burst of Celerity
String.tooltip: Your attack speed increases by $value for $time.

String.name: Smoke Aggressor I
String.tooltip: Sacrifice 20% of your HP to summon a spirit for 20 seconds. Your spirit receives 1.5 times the HP you sacrificed and retains your aggro level from your enemies.

String.name: Evasive Smash I

String.name: Explosion Trap I
String.tooltip: Launch a trap 15m in front of you. The trap lasts for 10 seconds or until triggered. Inflicts explosion damage on the target and surrounding enemies.

String.name: Raze
String.tooltip: Knocks down enemies around you while moving forward. This skill chains off of Combo Attack.

String.name: Thrall of Protection I
String.tooltip: Summon a Thrall of Protection that uses melee attacks to draw aggro from monsters. Lasts 10 minutes or until death.

String.name: Wallop I
String.tooltip: Jump forward and hammer the ground with your shield to inflict damage with a chance of stunning your targets. Activates faster if you first use Charging Lunge, Shield Barrage, Debilitate, Shield Counter, or Spring Attack.

String.name: Retaliate I
String.tooltip: Leap to your feet while attacking your target. You can use this skill only when knocked down. You become briefly immune to knockdown, stagger, and stuns.

String.name: Ultimate Overhand Strike I
String.tooltip: Even stronger Overhand Strike.

String.name: Time Gyre I
String.tooltip: Briefly immobilize up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance. Prevents other players from using evasion and movement skills. Effect ends after the target takes damage or is knocked down. Click the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then click the skill button again to shoot at all targets. Using this skill on a target cursed with Nerve Exhaustion will remove the Nerve Exhaustion effect from the target.

String.name: Thrall of Life I
String.tooltip: Summon a Thrall of Life that periodically heals you and removes harmful effects. Lasts 12 seconds or until death.

String.name: Rallying Cry
String.tooltip: Your defiant shout draws aggro while you and party members within $maxDistance become immune to knockdown and stagger for $time. Shares the same cooldown with Guardian Shout.

String.name: Final Reprisal I
String.tooltip: Release energy from your staff that damages enemies within $maxDistance. Can be used as a chain skill after Shocking Implosion or Triple Nemesis.

String.name: Hail Storm I
String.tooltip: Summon an icy storm 12m in front of you for 10 seconds damaging all targets in 6m radius. Slows targets by $value per hit. Effect stacks up to four times.

String.name: Eagle's Eye I
String.tooltip: Increase power by 30, attack speed by 4 and endurance by 4. Increases damage to monsters by 10%. Cannot be used in conjunction with Sniper's Eye.

String.name: Sonorous Dreams I
String.tooltip: Put target briefly to sleep. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount target within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to cast at your target.

String.name: Mana Charge
String.tooltip: Hold down the skill button, then release it to restore MP to you and up to 25 party/raid members within 18m. The longer you hold down the button, the more MP is restored. While charging up, you can move at full speed.

String.name: Stone Skin
String.tooltip: Encases your body in stone for 5 seconds, protecting you from all attacks and dropping all aggro.

String.name: Traverse Cut I
String.tooltip: Make 3 quick lunges to the front. Activates faster and attack up to 13 times if you first use Pounce or Combative Strike. Target's Endurance decreases by 0.85% per each hit, and the effect stacks.

String.name: Curse of Exhaustion I
String.tooltip: Curse your enemies with 20% increased cooldown times for all skills they use in the next 6 seconds. Effective only on other players. Press the skill button once and mouseover to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again to curse all targets.

String.name: Plague of Exhaustion I
String.tooltip: Call up a plague that immediately removes all beneficial effects and inflicts $value damage every $tickInterval for $time on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance. Against other players, the damage decreases, but their cooldown time increases by 50% for some of their skills. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on targets, then press the skill button again or left-click to plague all targets.

String.name: Nova
String.tooltip: Unleash a massive explosion, which deals huge damage to enemies within 6m radius and can knock them down. While using this skill you are less likely to be knocked down or staggered, and take only half damage.

String.name: Scythe I
String.tooltip: Deliver a deadly sweeping arc, attacking multiple enemies. Scythe spends your Edge to do more damage. This skill activates faster when following Rain of Blows, Blade Draw, or Evasive Roll.

String.name: Tenacity
String.tooltip: Call on inner reserves to instantly replenish $mpDiff MP. Briefly increases resistance to stun immensely.

String.name: Curse of Confusion
String.tooltip: Curse foes so they tremble and flee briefly. For monsters, this skill's effect is canceled immediately when knocked down. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to curse all targets.

String.name: Guardian Sanctuary I
String.tooltip: Reduces ranged damage taken by $value2 for $time, while increasing weakening and DOT resistances by $value and greatly increasing stun resistance.

String.name: Warp Barrier
String.tooltip: Cancel all damage for $time and recover 3% of maximum MP per hit.

String.name: Reaping Slash I
String.tooltip: Chop targets with both blades at once. Those you hit briefly take 25% more damage from your Scythe attack. Build your Warrior's Edge before attacking to greatly increase the effect duration. Can only be used while in Assault Stance.

String.name: Mire I
String.tooltip: Movement speed of targets decreases by $value, but their balance increases by $value2. Effect ends when the target takes significant damage or is knocked down. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount targets within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to slow all targets.

String.name: Divine Respite I
String.tooltip: Recover 1.8% of your total HP every $tickInterval for $time (modified by your heal bonus).

String.name: Cross Parry
String.tooltip: Block frontal attacks with your crossed swords. Damage blocked depends on your weapon's stats. Lasts as long as the skill button is held down. Allies behind you also get reduced damage. Can only be used while in Defensive Stance.

String.name: Mire I
String.tooltip: Movement speed of targets decreases by $value, but their balance increases by $value2. Effect ends when the target takes significant damage or is knocked down. String.name: Thrall of Vengeance I
String.tooltip: Summon a Thrall of Vengeance that attacks your enemies at range. Lasts 60 seconds or until death.

String.name: Ishara's Lullaby I
String.tooltip: Put target briefly to sleep. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on up to $maxCount target within $maxDistance, then press the skill button again or left-click to cast at your target.

String.name: Smoke Flanker I
String.tooltip: Summon a shadow to your position, teleport behind your enemy, and attack it. Briefly stuns your target. Aggro transfers to your shadow upon summoning. Use after a successful Cross Parry on a target within a range of $maxDistance.

String.name: Thrall of Vengeance II
String.tooltip: Summon a Thrall of Vengeance that attacks your enemies at range. Lasts 60 seconds or until death.

String.name: Ishara's Lullaby II

String.name: Command: Attack
String.tooltip: Aim at a target within $maxDistance and press the skill button to command your summoned creature to attack that target.

String.name: Energy Stars I
String.tooltip: Fires an energy bolt at a target within $maxDistance. The bolt damages the target while increasing the power of group members within 35 meters by 20 and attack speed by 11 for 20 seconds. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on target, then press the skill button again or left-click to shoot.

String.name: Command: Follow
String.tooltip: Command your thrall to follow you.

String.name: Epiphany of the Goddess I
String.tooltip: TEST Priest Skill 1 (T4+)

String.name: Warding Totem I
String.tooltip: Summons a totem 10m in front of you which casts a warding effect on allies within 20m and recovers 339 HP every 2 seconds. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Healing Immersion I
String.tooltip: Lock on a target within 19m and fire a healing light to restore HP by $hpDiff (modified by your heal bonus) to all party members within 7m of the locked target. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on the target, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Healing Immersion I
String.tooltip: Lock on a target within 19m and fire a healing light to restore HP by $hpDiff (modified by your heal bonus) to all party members within 7m of the locked target. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on the target, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Warding Totem II
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which casts a warding effect on allies within 20m and recovers 700 HP every 2 seconds. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Healing Immersion II

Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on the target, then press the skill button again or left-click to heal all targets.

String.name: Numbing Totem
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which decreases the attack speed of enemies within 15m. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Backstep
String.tooltip: Quickly back up out of harm's way.

String.name: Speed Totem
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which increases the attack speed of allies within 7m. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Grace of Resurrection
String.tooltip: Grants a blessing enabling the priest to resurrect immediately with 100% HP and MP, and 120% Stamina. The effect lasts for $time, and you can only resurrect while it is still in effect.

String.name: Assailing Totem
String.tooltip: Summon a totem 10m in front of you which decreases resistance to harmful effects of enemies within 15m. The totem lasts for 60 seconds.

String.name: Rolling Reload
String.tooltip: Roll forward to dodge enemy attacks and eliminate cooldown for Scattershot. Cancels all skill animations except for that of Balder's Vengeance. You are not immune to damage while rolling.

String.name: Zenobia's Vortex
String.tooltip: Unleashes a whirlwind up to 18m, dealing damage to all enemies in its path and briefly throwing them into the air, unless they are elite or BAMs.

String.name: Shadow Step
String.tooltip: Instantly leap forward to evade enemy attacks. You can Shadow Step twice within 4 seconds, and you can change direction between leaps. A cooldown triggers after the second leap (or 4 seconds after the first).

String.name: Shadow Step
String.tooltip: Instantly leap forward to evade enemy attacks. You can Shadow Step twice within 4 seconds, and you can change direction between leaps. A cooldown triggers after the second leap (or 4 seconds after the first).

String.name: Contagion
String.tooltip: Infects one target within $maxDistance with Infection. This target cannot be purified. Infected target's endurance is reduced by 5% and they spread a disease that deals 15086 damage per second. Players take less damage and recover fewer HP. Using this skill does not automatically start combat status.

String.name: Divine Intervention
String.tooltip: Retrieves a party member within $maxDistance in front of the caster. Press the skill button once and mouse over to lock on target, then press the skill button again or left-click to activate the skill. Cannot grab an ally riding a mount or beyond an obstacle.

String.name: Boomerang Pulse
String.tooltip: Fire a rebounding bolt which damages all enemies in its path, and also heals party members in its path by 2439 (modified by your heal bonus). Using this skill does not automatically start combat status.

String.name: Last Aman Standing
String.tooltip: Your resistance to knockdown and stun improves for $time.

String.name: Ancient Wellspring
String.tooltip: Replenish all your HP by tapping magic from a bygone age.

String.name: Skirmish Running
String.tooltip: Your combat speed increases by $value for $time, but your resistance to knockdown is reduced by $value2. Effect ends when you are knocked down.

String.name: Core Infusion
String.tooltip: Replenish 100% of your MP through the power of the Core.

String.name: Deft Footwork
String.tooltip: Your chances of being knocked down or staggered by another player decrease drastically for $time.

String.name: Soothing Presence
String.tooltip: Monsters do not make preemptive attacks, but your movement speed decreases by $value2 for $time. Effect immediately disappears when you use a skill or item, or when combat starts.

String.name: Horizon Run
String.tooltip: Your speed increases by $value for $time outside of combat.

String.name: Summon: Harley (Stam.)
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRegenerates stamina$COLOR_END$BRHog mount Harley with a movement speed of 280. Gradually recovers Stamina during the ride.

String.name: Summon: Magical Flame
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODRegenerates MP, HP and Stamina$COLOR_END$BROstrich Magical Flame with a movement speed of 310. During the ride your MP, HP and Stamina are gradually restored.

String.name: Kick
String.tooltip: Kick the rolling haybale to move it around the playing area.

String.name: Pig Pheromone
String.tooltip: Throw pheromones at a pigling from $maxDistance or less to make it follow you.

String.name: Drum Beat
String.tooltip: Aim and hit a toad drum within $maxDistance to play it.

String.name: {@RawItem:45292}
String.tooltip: Argon Repeller #1

String.tooltip: Argon Repeller #2

String.name: {@RawItem:45294}
String.tooltip: Argon Repeller #3

String.name: {@RawItem:45299}
String.tooltip: Throws a plant.

String.name: Mutate (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Turns a target within $maxDistance into a warthog that will fight for you. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Stun (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Stuns targets within $maxDistance temporarily. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Fear (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Frightens targets within $maxDistance. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Light (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Summons Balder's lamp $maxDistance in front of you. Balder's lamp kills monsters within 8m. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Punish (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Inflicts great damage on a target within $maxDistance. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Quake (Balder's Gift)
String.tooltip: Knocks down targets within $maxDistance. A temporary skill given to you from the clerics of Balder to battle the Banquet of Blood.

String.name: Collectivist
String.tooltip: Increases gold loot acquired by 10%.

String.name: Adiar's Request
String.tooltip: Teleports you to Free Traders Hall.

String.name: Union Mission
String.tooltip: Increases reputation credits acquired from dailies by 5%.

String.name: Derene's Request
String.tooltip: Teleports you to Enlightened Union Hall.

String.name: Hard Core
String.tooltip: Increases tenacity by 5%.

String.name: Frateko's Request
String.tooltip: Teleports you to Iron Order Hall.

String.name: Summon: Quartermaster Shop
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODPolicy point cost: 5,400$COLOR_END$BRSummon an alliance merchant who can sell various consumable items.

String.name: Summon: Infiltration Beacon
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODPolicy point cost: 1,700$COLOR_END$BRSummon a beacon, designating an area where fellow soldiers can teleport.$BR(Can be used only inside an alliance territory.) The summoned Infiltration Beacon lasts for 5 minutes.

String.name: Summon: Guard
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODPolicy point cost: 2,700$COLOR_END$BRSummons a guard.$BR(Can be used only inside your alliance territory.) The summoned guard lasts until he dies.

String.name: Summon: Free Traders Guard
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODPolicy point cost: 2,700$COLOR_END$BRSummon a Free Traders guard.$BR(Can be used only inside the Free Traders' territory.) The summoned guard lasts until he dies.

String.name: Summon: Enlightened Union Guard
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODPolicy point cost: 2,700$COLOR_END$BRSummon an Enlightened Union guard.$BR(Can be used only inside the Enlightened Union territory.) The summoned guard lasts until he dies.

String.name: Summon: Iron Order Guard
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODPolicy point cost: 2,700$COLOR_END$BRSummon an Iron Order guard.$BR(Can be used only inside the Iron Order territory.) The summoned guard lasts until he dies.

String.name: Summon: Barricade
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODPolicy point cost: 1,100$COLOR_END$BRSummon a wooden barricade.$BR(Can be used only inside an alliance territory.) The summoned barricade lasts until it is destroyed.

String.name: Summon: Cannon
String.tooltip: $H_S_GOODPolicy point cost: 13,000$COLOR_END$BRSummon a cannon.$BR(Can be used only inside an alliance territory.) The summoned cannon lasts until it is destroyed.

String.name: Tenacious Aura
String.tooltip: Creates an aura of immunity to stun and knockdown effect for allies near the assault commander. (Only activates in alliance territory during alliance conflicts.)

String.name: Enduring Aura
String.tooltip: Creates an aura of increased endurance and defense for allies near the defense commander. (Only activates in alliance territory during alliance conflicts.)

String.name: Wholehearted Aura
String.tooltip: Creates an aura of continual Stamina restoration for allies near the adjunct commander. (Only activates in alliance territory during alliance conflicts.)

String.name: Scythe
